name: Anarchy Fishing
description:
Anarchy Fishing was designed from the start to take the idea of the fishing mini-game, and expand it into a game itself, without over-complicating the fishing mechanics, or implementing too many unnecessary features. This game is in active development and will likely receive larger updates within time frames ranging between 2 weeks and 2 months.

Controls:

  • Esc - Pull up exit menu
  • I - Inventory
  • E - Interact
  • Left click - Cast/Reel fishing line
  • H - hide shekel count
